title: I Know My Prey
description: You get +1 ongoing when knowingly investigating, pursuing or fighting the breed of monster that caused your loss.

submoves.title: Starting Moves
submoves.description: You get this move and 2 others of your choice below

title: Berserk
description: No matter how much harm you take, you can always keep going until the current fight is over. During a fight, the Keeper may not use harm moves on you and you cannot die. When the fight ends, all harm takes effect as normal.

title: NEVER AGAIN
description: In combat, you may choose to **protect someone** without rolling, as if you had rolled a 10+, but you may not choose to "suffer little harm."

title: What Does Not Kill Me...
description: If you have suffered harm in a fight, you gain +1 ongoing until the fight is over.

title: Fervor
description: When you **manipulate someone**, roll +Tough instead of +Charm.

title: Safety First
description: You have jury-rigged extra protection into your gear, giving you +1 armour (maximum 2-armour).

title: DIY Surgery (+Cool)
description: When you do quick and dirty first aid on someone (including yourself), roll +Cool.

outcomes.text: It's all good, it counts as normal first aid, plus stabilize the injury and heal 1 harm.
It counts as normal first aid, plus one of these, your choice:
bullets: Stabilise the injury but the patient takes -1 forward.
Heal 1-harm and stabilise for now, but it will return as 2-harm and become unstable again later.
Heal 1-harm and stabilise but the patient takes -1 ongoing until it's fixed properly.

title: Tools Matter
description: With your signature weapon (see your gear, below), you get +1 to **kick some ass**.

title: Gear
description:
Pick one signature weapon and two practical weapons.

You have protective wear, suited to your look, worth 1-armour.

If you want, you may take a classic car, classic motorcycle, plain pickup, or plain van.

title: Signature Weapons
pickOne: Sawn-off shotgun (3-harm hand/close messy loud reload)
Huge sword or huge axe (3-harm hand messy heavy)

Specialist weapons for destroying your foes (e.g. wooden stakes and mallet for vampires, silver dagger for werewolves, etc.). 4-harm against the specific creatures it targets, 1-harm otherwise, and other tags by agreement with the Keeper.
Chainsaw (3-harm hand messy unreliable loud heavy)

title: Practical Weapons
pick: Assault rifle (3-harm close area loud reload)
